import React, { Component } from 'react' import Loading from '../Loading/Loading' class ReposDiv extends Component{ render(){ const { data } = this.p return (
{ data.length ? data.map((game) => (
{game.title}

{game.short_description}

Genre: {game.genre} Platform: {game.platform}
Release date: {game.release_date}
)) : }
) } } function ReposDiv2({data}) { return (
{ data.length ? data.map((game) => (
{game.title}

{game.short_description}

Genre: {game.genre} Platform: {game.platform}
Release date: {game.release_date}
)) : }
) } export default ReposDiv
